DOC.brief_summary: Phase 3 study to Evaluate cardiovascular outcomes in patients with type 2 diabetes treated with ITCA 650.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate Cardiovascular Outcomes in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Treated With ITCA 650
DOC.criteria: HBA1c > 6.5% History of coronary, cerebrovascular or peripheral artery disease history of pancreatitis
